es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential
Class ResourceType.ResourceList

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.ResourceType.ResourceList
Enclosing class:
ResourceType
protected class ResourceType.ResourceList
extends java.lang.Object

Handles the overlap of timetable entries for the same resource, i.e., a resource that has several timetable entries at the same time interval with the same resource type. This list counts how many times it occurs to avoid incorrect behaviors of the amount of available resources.

Author:
Iván Castilla Rodríguez

Constructor Detail

public ResourceType.ResourceList()
Creates a new resource list.

Method Detail

add

public void add(Resource res)
Adds a resource. If the resource isn't present in the list, it's included with a "1" count. If the resource exists already, the count is increased.

Parameters:
res - The resource added

add

public void add(Resource res,
                int count)
Adds a resource. The count of the resource is explicitly declared.

Parameters:
res - The resource added
count - How many times the resource has been put as available for this resource type.

remove

public boolean remove(Resource res)
Removes a resource. The resource can have more than one appearance in the list. In this case, it's no t really removed.

Parameters:
res - The resource removed.
Returns:
True if the resource is completely removed from the list. False in other case.

Returns the resource at the specified position

Parameters:
index - The position of the resource
Returns:
The resource at the specified position.

getCounter

public int getCounter(int index)
Returns the count at the specified position

Parameters:
index - The position of the count.
Returns:
the count at the specified position

size

public int size()
Returns the number of resources in this list.

Returns:
The number of resources in this list.
